TriggerGroup.name: Curing
TriggerGroup.script: -- red ff0000 -- white e6e6e6 -- green 00aa00 --[[selectCurrentLine() bg("red") red, duh setBgcolor(0,170,0) green setFgColor(230,230,230) white resetFormat()]]

TriggerGroup.name: Afflictions
TriggerGroup.script: --all marked!! --A vast majority of these lines are taken from m&m, so huge kudos to Vadi!

TriggerGroup.name: A
TriggerGroup.script: --warrior affs: arteries --figure out what to do with attraction --just added amnesia

regexCodeList.string: Flames lick around you - you are on fire!
You are scorched by the firewall as you pass through.
You've been caught aflame!
The air around you suddenly erupts into flames, scorching your body.
The flames around you suddenly erupt into a blazing pyre.
^Your flesh blisters as you reach through the ring of fire that surrounds \w+\.$
Steam rises from your skin as the fires that plague you are extinguished.
You sigh in relief as the fire on your body flickers and fades.
The raging fire about your skin goes out.
With a loud hiss of steam, you sigh in relief as the waters put out the flames on your body.
A chill runs over your icy skin.
You blanch as the high-pitched screech settles deep within your mind.
The screeching fades away from your inner hearing.

TriggerGroup.name: aeon
TriggerGroup.script: --affliction message and two symptoms --rather than sending aeon to the FirstAid queue, this directly sips phelgmatic and pauses curing until aeon is gone.

Trigger.name: add
Trigger.script: if not medic.stop then send("sip phlegmatic") medic.stop = true tempTimer(1.5, [[medic.stop = false]]) end

regexCodeList.string: Suddenly your movements through the time stream are slowed.
You feel the world about you slow.
You move sluggishly into action.
You are afflicted with aeon.
You return to the normal timestream.
You feel a terrible thirst for elixirs grow within you.
Your terrible addiction to lovely elixirs seems to wane.
Your amplified fears start to settle down.
A new left leg grows where the old one was, though one that is quite sickly and in poor repair.
A new right leg grows where the old one was, though one that is quite sickly and in poor repair.
A new left arm grows where the old one was, though one that is quite sickly and in poor repair.
A new right arm grows where the old one was, though one that is quite sickly and in poor repair.
You blink.
You blink.
The idea of eating or drinking is repulsive to you.
The idea of putting something in your stomach sickens you.
Food is no longer repulsive to you.

TriggerGroup.script: --three symptoms, though I don't think they're all right

TriggerGroup.name: blackout
TriggerGroup.script: --FirstAid will use allheale if you activate the add and remove triggers --it is recommended to diagnose once this is cured, if you're in PvP --it can generally be ignored in bashing --four lines

regexCodeList.string: Experiencing a shortness of breath, you suddenly black out.

Your vision slowly fades into nothing but curiously floating purple spots\.$
Your senses return to you as the blackout ends.
Your senses return in a rush.
Your enhanced vivaciousness repels blackout.

TriggerGroup.name: bleeding
TriggerGroup.script: --sending FIRSTAID directly will make you clot a certain number of times, determined by how much bleeding you have, this may be preferable to you --FirstAid does not attempt to cure bleeding otherwise, so adding it to the queue is pointless --Medic! will begin clotting at a certain threshold, and keep clotting until all bleeding is gone --WARNING: there is no failsafe to keep you from using all your mana

Trigger.name: add
Trigger.script:
if tonumber(matches[2]) > 50 then if not medic.stop then send("clot") end end
--You can put your own priority in here

regexCodeList.string: ^You bleed (\d+) health\.$

TriggerGroup.name: cloudcoils

Trigger.name: add
Trigger.script: medic.addaff("cloudcoils") if not medic.coils or medic.coils <= 0 then medic.coils = 1 else medic.coils = medic.coils + 1 end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ raises (?:his|her) arm and clenches (?:his|her) fist, causing air to swirl around you\. The wind suddenly tightens like painful, constricting bands squeezing the breath from your body, but you grit your teeth and persevere, but you are left with more pressure than before\.$
A cold wind blows chill grey clouds in from the north. The clouds circle around you, suddenly constricting into a tight band of compressed air that makes it hard to breathe.

Trigger.name: remove
Trigger.script:
medic.coils = medic.coils -1
if medic.coils <= 0 then medic.removeaff("cloudcoils") end

A zombie covered in tumours wraps his slimy tongue around your body, pulling you against him while he gnaws on your face.
His beady eyes wavering before you, a large, hairy solifugid suddenly rears up and sprays you with a mass of sticky black webbing.
A mass of tentacles smacks you with a thick tentacle, covering you in thick slime.
A giant crystalline squid grasps you with his tentacles, his grip like iron as he draws you in closely and tears into you with his parrot-like beak.
Launching itself at your chest, a cheuped sends you sprawling to the ground.
^A.+ roc bats at you with powerful wings, knocking you to the ground\.$
^Pawing the dirt, a \w+ rockeater charges at you, knocking you off your feet\.$
^A \w+ zombie stumbles forward with an unintelligible roar, slamming into you and throwing you to the ground\.$
A giant, dark-furred otter bounds forward, trampling you flat with a high-pitched, irritated growl.
A dracnari warrior knocks your legs out from under you and sends you sprawling to the floor.
^A snow\w+ glides suddenly towards you and bumps his bulky body into you, knocking you down\.$
A mantis-like mantekarr fixes his compound eyes on you and beats his prismatic wings furiously, sending a blast of air that knocks you to the ground.
An ice mammoth swings her trunk at you, hitting you solidly across the skull and flinging you to the ground.
You are swept off your feet by a giant tentacle.
A female aslaran crouches on powerful legs that bulge with muscle, and abruptly headbutts you in the gut, knocking you over and winding you.
A raging inferno suddenly blazes through the room, causing you to scream in agony as your skin cracks and blisters.
An inferno beetle rears back and shoots a jet of liquid flame at you.
Backing slowly up, an inferno beetle clacks its mandibles together, which begin glowing to a blinding white heat. Suddenly, it unleashes a column of blazing flames at you.
Shaking its head side to side, an inferno beetle charges at you with flames shooting forth from its mandibles.
A snow phoenix draws his wings close before flapping them wildly, conjuring blistering cold winds to stop you cold in your place.
A luminous purple spined starfish spins about in the sand. Several spines rocket from his form to pierce you painfully. An unnerving chill runs down your spine as you lose control of your limbs.
Small balls of yellow spore bud off of a floating, puffball fungal asconoid and pelt your exposed skin, raising inflamed welts as your muscles lock up.
A mutated, undead cave-fisher jerks forward, covering you in a spray of his saliva. You scream as the acidic spit eats into your skin.
Countless filaments suddenly lash out at you from an aetheretic slivven, tiny poisonous barbs dig into your flesh causing you to stagger on your feet as your body locks up in agony.
Your muscles lock up, freezing solid with some unnatural chill, bursting into fiery pain as you attempt to move.
An alien scream pierces your mind, akin to the howling winds across a mountainous peak. As the screaming winds fall silent, you find yourself upon the ground, your body not responding.
A snowman huffs and puffs, taking a very deep breath before blowing an arctic wind at you.
A fierce ice wyrm undulates wildly. A coil wraps about your chest, freezing the skin around it as it constricts painfully, robbing you of breath.
A fierce ice wyrm opens his maw wide, exhaling a frigid jet of unadulterated frost that clings to you, swiftly encasing you in a shell of ice.
Hanili, Beauty of the Icewynd blows you a kiss, a cloud of frost pouring from her lips to engulf you, drawing you into lethargy as the warmth seeps from your body.
Black spores erupt from the mushrooms on an algae-like phycomid's back, covering your face and filling your lungs in a thick cloud.
A freezing eyebane turns toward you, his primary eye glowing a brilliant, bright blue. Pain blossoms in your chest as your lungs freeze.
^A crackling \w+ joule flares to blinding brilliance suddenly, ribbons of incandescent energy scourging your eyes\.$
A fierce sandshark flicks his fin and shoots some sand into your face.
Agonized shrieks of pain tear themselves from your lungs as you collapse to your knees, grabbing at your face. Thick, viscous fluid begins to pour into your eyes as skin begins to slough away.
A great horned owl deftly plucks out your eye with his beak and swallows.
One of a two-headed abhorrence's heads exhales a hot blast of steam into your eyes, blinding you.
A slavering stoneghast spits a black mist into your eyes.
A jewelled stalker dashes around you in a series of tight circles, light refracting from his scales in a dazzling display of colour that sears your eyes, dancing spots stealing your vision.
A sand cobra rears up, and then spits a stream of venom into your face. You feel your eyes begin to burn as the dark liquid sinks in.
The motes about a dream's manifestation whirl quickly as shafts of light erupt from within, painfully bright light drowning everything else out of sight.
An ice mammoth swings her trunk at you, hitting you solidly across the skull and flinging you to the ground.
A sudden buzzing fills your ears as an oppressive, alien presence cleaves through your thoughts, scrambling your senses as up becomes down and the world spins about you.
Hanili, Beauty of the Icewynd whirls about in a graceful dance, silks and gems flashing in a brilliant array of colour that pierces your mind, your grip on reality growing slack.
A grotesque mutant mushroom pulls back and exhales, blowing his acrid breath at you. Your stomach can't help but turn as you gasp for air.
A multi-stemmed fungoid basidion begins to glow a bright and beguiling yellow, swaying and dancing before you, confusing your mind.
^An illithoid \w+ closes his reddened eyes in concentration as a flash of disorienting energy fills your mind's eye\.$
^Rapidly beating (?:his|her) wings, an? \w+ manticore causes the air to stir violently and buffets you with great force\. The impact sends you flying into the wall headfirst\.$
Crackling with electricity, a horrific, diseased parasite's aura suddenly discharges a powerful bolt of black lightning into your chest, leaving you spasming.
An emaciated virgin whispers of the dark things she wants to do to you and while you're caught off guard, slams a dagger into your ear.
A cloud carrion squats low before launching great clouds of toxic air in your direction, your senses failing from the assault.
^An ice\w+ grabs a large chunk of ice nearby and hurls it at your head. It connects painfully with a solid thump\.$
^An ice\w+ raises (?:his|her) hand into the air, and with sudden incredible force, strikes the back of (?:his|her) hand across your face\.$
A snowlady grabs a large wooden rolling pin and swings at you, connecting with your skull.
An emaciated virgin whispers of the dark things she wants to do to you and while you're caught off guard, slams a dagger into your ear.
Your mind suddenly goes black and all that you know ceases.
A cloud manta whips his stinger at your head, knocking you out with a resounding crack.
^Energy crackles through the air around an? \w+ luminox as countless stars release a thunderous storm of energy to overwhelm you with searing pain that sends your senses into a spin\.$
Heaving a massive war axe through the air, a cursed suit of living dark armour hacks into you, almost cleaving right through you.
^Rapidly beating (?:his|her) wings, an? \w+ manticore causes the air to stir violently and buffets you with great force\. The impact sends you flying into the wall headfirst\.$
A giant squid's body flickers beautifully as he produces mesmerizing lights which cause your mind to wander.
A golden firefly squid's body flickers beautifully as he produces mesmerizing lights which cause your mind to wander.
A scuttling frost mane scuttles forward, snapping one grotesquely elongated arm forward to wrap his fingers around your head, sending a bone-freezing cold through your skull.
^A statue of .+ unleashes a bolt of energy that slams into you\.$
^A \w+ totem unleashes a bolt of energy that slams into you\.$

Trigger.name: Logout
Trigger.script: remember("medic") saveVars() local count = 0 for i in pairs(gmcp.Char.Defences.List) do if gmcp.Char.Defences.List[i].name == "blindness" then count = count + 1 end if gmcp.Char.Defences.List[i].name == "deafness" then count = count + 1 end end if count > 0 then send("apply epidermal to head") end if count > 1 then tempTimer(2, [[send("apply epidermal to head")]]) end

Trigger.name: prompt
Trigger.script: if medic.pause then cecho(" <red>{Paused}") end medic.changes() medic.cure() medic.warnings() medic.chaser.chase() if gagPrompt then deleteLine() gagPrompt = false end

Alias.name: Pause
Alias.script: if medic.pause == true then medic.note("Curing enabled", "green") medic.pause = false send("curing on") else medic.pause = true medic.note("Curing paused", "red") send("curing off") end

Alias.name: Ignore aff
Alias.script: if matches[2] then local aff = string.lower(matches[2]) if table.contains(medic.ignore, aff) then for k,v in pairs(medic.ignore) do if v == aff then table.remove(medic.ignore, k) remember("medic") medic.note("No longer ignoring <red>"..matches[2]) end end else table.insert(medic.ignore, matches[2]) remember("medic") medic.note("Now ignoring <red>"..matches[2]) end else medic.note("We are ignoring <red>"..table.concat(medic.ignore, "<grey>, <red>")) end --To ignore an affliction, use 'medic ignore <affliction> --Make sure you check the FirstAid database to be sure you're using the right aff name --WHATCURES <affliction> --WHATISCURED BY <cure>

Alias.name: Reset
Alias.script: --use this when things go wrong medic.reset() medic.diag = true

Alias.name: Diagnose
Alias.script: medic.diag = true medic.chaser.chase()

Alias.name: Unknown affs
Alias.script: if matches[2] then medic.unknownThres = tonumber(matches[2]) end medic.note("Will diagnose at <white>"..medic.unknownThres.."<green> unknown afflictions")

Alias.name: prio aff
Alias.script: send("curing prioaff "..matches[2])

AliasGroup.name: Sipper
AliasGroup.script: --[[Sip At levels are the percentage at which you want to sip. hps 70 will sip when you're at or below 70% health. Your settings should be saved between sessions, so you won't have to set them everytime you login.]]

Alias.name: Health Sip At
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "s" then medic.sipper.health.scroll = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Using healing scroll at <green>"..matches[3].."% <red>health", "grey") elseif matches[2] == "b" then medic.sipper.health.moss = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Eating moss/potash at <green>"..matches[3].."% <red>health", "grey") else medic.sipper.health.sip = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Sipping <red>health <grey>at <green>"..matches[3].."%", "grey") end

Alias.name: Mana Sip At
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "s" then medic.sipper.mana.scroll = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Using healing scroll at <green>"..matches[3].."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey") elseif matches[2] == "b" then medic.sipper.mana.moss = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Using moss/potash at <green>"..matches[3].."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey") else medic.sipper.mana.sip = tonumber(matches[3]) remember("medic") medic.note("Sipping <DeepSkyBlue>mana <grey>at <green>"..matches[3].."%", "grey") end

Alias.name: Set Priority
Alias.script:
medic.sipper.prio[tonumber(matches[2])] = matches[3] remember("medic") medic.note("Sipping priority is " ..table.concat(medic.sipper.prio, ", "))
--[[This must be set in order for the sipper to work. There are three priorities, which you set with sp1, sp2, and sp3. This is the order the sipper will check your current stat against your sipping level. ]]

Alias.name: show everything
Alias.script: medic.note("Priority is " ..table.concat(medic.sipper.prio, ", ")) medic.note("Potion levels are <green>"..medic.sipper.health.sip.."% <red>health<grey>, <green>"..medic.sipper.mana.sip.."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey") medic.note("Moss/potash levels are <green>"..medic.sipper.health.moss.."% <red>health<grey>, <green>"..medic.sipper.mana.moss.."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey")

Alias.name: scroll level
Alias.script: if matches[2] then local level = tonumber(matches[2]) medic.sipper.health.scroll = level medic.sipper.mana.scroll = level end medic.note("Healing Scroll levels are <green>"..medic.sipper.health.scroll.."% <red>health<grey>, <green>"..medic.sipper.mana.scroll.."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey")

Alias.name: moss level
Alias.script:
if matches[2] then local level = tonumber(matches[2]) medic.sipper.health.moss = level medic.sipper.mana.moss = level end
medic.note("Moss/potash levels are <green>"..medic.sipper.health.moss.."% <red>health<grey>, <green>"..medic.sipper.mana.moss.."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana<grey>", "grey")

Alias.name: potion level
Alias.script: if matches[2] then local level = tonumber(matches[2]) medic.sipper.health.sip = level medic.sipper.mana.sip = level end medic.note("Potion levels are <green>"..medic.sipper.health.sip.."% <red>health<grey>, <green>"..medic.sipper.mana.sip.."% <DeepSkyBlue>mana", "grey")

Alias.name: do queue
Alias.script: medic.chaser.add(matches[2]) medic.note("Added '"..matches[2].."' to the queue", "grey") medic.chaser.chase()

Alias.name: clear the queue
Alias.script: medic.chaser.clear()

Alias.name: repeat
Alias.script: if matches[2] then medic.chaser.dor(matches[2]) medic.note("Will repeat '"..matches[2].."'", "grey") medic.chaser.chase() else if medic.chaser.repete then medic.chaser.repete = false medic.note("Will no longer repeat actions","grey") else medic.note("Not currently repeating actions","grey") end end

Alias.name: go
Alias.script: medic.chaser.dochase = true medic.chaser.chase()

Alias.name: defup
Alias.script:
--medic.chaser.add("action") --defense 1 needs equilibrium, and also uses it, but doesn't care about balance medic.chaser.add("defense 1") --defense 2 is a free action, like rubbing an enchantment medic.chaser.addFree("rub mercy") --defense 3 needs both balance and equilibrium, but only uses balance medic.chaser.add("defense 3")
medic.chaser.chase()

Alias.name: do free
Alias.script: medic.chaser.addFree(matches[2]) medic.note("Added '"..matches[2].."' to the free queue", "grey") medic.chaser.chase()

Alias.name: toggle rebounding
Alias.script: if medic.rebound then send("curing priority defence rebounding reset") else send("curing priority defence rebounding 10") end

Alias.name: lyre mode
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "l" then medic.lyre = true medic.chaser.add("strum lyre") else medic.lyre = false medic.pause = false send("curing on") end

Script.name: Initialization
Curing
Script.script:
medic.unknown = 0 medic.stop = false medic.afflist = {}
function medic.cure() if medic.stop == false and medic.pause == false then if medic.unknown >= medic.unknownThres then medic.diag = true end end end
function medic.addaff(aff) if table.contains(medic.ignore, aff) then return else if aff == "blackedout" then enableTrigger("Blackout mode") elseif aff == "disrupted" then enableTrigger("disrupt check") elseif aff == "pressure" then medic.pressure = 1 end if not table.contains(medic.afflist, aff) then table.insert(medic.afflist, aff) end end end
function medic.removeaff(aff) if table.contains(medic.ignore, aff) then return else if aff == "blackedout" then disableTrigger("Blackout mode") elseif aff == "pressure" then medic.pressure = 0 end if table.contains(medic.afflist, aff) then table.remove(medic.afflist, table.index_of(medic.afflist, aff)) elseif medic.unknown > 0 then medic.unknown = medic.unknown - 1 end end end
function medic.warnings() if medic.pressure and medic.pressure > 4 then cecho("<red> Pressure at "..medic.pressure) end --latch checking local num = 0 if table.contains(medic.afflist, "addiction") then num = num + 1 end if table.contains(medic.afflist, "haemophilia") then num = num + 1 end if table.contains(medic.afflist, "nausea") then num = num + 1 end if table.contains(medic.afflist, "lethargy") then num = num + 1 end if vitals.bleeding >= 200 then num = num + 1 end if table.contains(medic.afflist, "latched") then cecho("<red> You have been latched!!") elseif num > 2 then cecho("<red> You are about to be latched!!") end end

Script.name: Sipper
Script.script: medic.sipper.bal = true function medic.sipper.sip() if medic.stop == false and medic.pause == false then medic.sipper.moss() medic.sipper.vessels("high") if medic.sipper.bal == true then medic.sipper.wounds("high") medic.sipper.potions() medic.sipper.wounds("low") end medic.sipper.vessels("low") end end

Script.name: wounds (rework for fractures)
assume wound levels
Script.script:
function medic.woundcheck(name, part) local level = true
for type in pairs(medic.woundaffs) do for _, aff in pairs(medic.woundaffs[type]) do if name == aff then echo("\n"..name.." found in "..type) level = type end end end
if medic.wounds[part] < medic.woundnumbers[level] then echo("\nWounds on "..part.." at "..medic.wounds[part]) medic.wounds[part] = medic.woundnumbers[level] echo("\nNow set to "..medic.wounds[part]) end
end

Script.name: aff data
moss
Script.script:
medic.moss = true if not medic.sipper.health.moss then medic.sipper.health.moss = 75 end if not medic.sipper.mana.moss then medic.sipper.mana.moss = 75 end
function medic.sipper.moss() if medic.moss == true then for _, stat in pairs(medic.sipper.prio) do if medic.sipper[stat]["moss"] == 0 then return elseif medic.sipper[stat]["cur"] <= (medic.sipper[stat]["max"] * (medic.sipper[stat]["moss"] / 100)) then send("outr moss;eat moss") medic.moss = 2 tempTimer(1, [[if medic.moss == 2 then medic.moss = true end]]) break end end end end

Script.name: potions
Script.script:
if not medic.sipper.health.sip then medic.sipper.health.sip = 75 end if not medic.sipper.mana.sip then medic.sipper.mana.sip = 75 end
function medic.sipper.potions() if medic.sipper.bal == true then for _, potion in pairs(medic.sipper.prio) do if medic.sipper[potion]["sip"] == 0 then return elseif medic.sipper[potion]["cur"] <= (medic.sipper[potion]["max"] * (medic.sipper[potion]["sip"] / 100)) then send("sip "..potion) medic.sipper.bal = 2 tempTimer(2, [[if medic.sipper.bal == 2 then medic.sipper.bal = true end]]) break end end end end

Script.name: Chaser
Script.script:
medic.chaser = medic.chaser or { free = {}, queue = {}, dochase = true, repete = false, }
function medic.chaser.chase() if medic.chaser.dochase == true and not medic.pause then if medic.bal == true and medic.equi == true then if #medic.chaser.free > 0 then expandAlias(medic.chaser.free[1]) table.remove(medic.chaser.free, 1) end if medic.diag and not medic.stop then send("diag me") elseif #medic.chaser.queue > 0 then expandAlias(medic.chaser.queue[1]) medic.chaser.dochase = 2 tempTimer(1, [[if medic.chaser.dochase == 2 then medic.chaser.dochase = true end]]) table.remove(medic.chaser.queue, 1) elseif medic.chaser.repete then expandAlias(medic.chaser.repete) medic.chaser.dochase = 2 tempTimer(1, [[if medic.chaser.dochase == 2 then medic.chaser.dochase = true end]]) end end end end
function medic.chaser.add(action) table.insert(medic.chaser.queue, action) end
function medic.chaser.addFree(action) table.insert(medic.chaser.free, action) end
function medic.chaser.dor(action) if medic.chaser.repete then medic.note("Replacing repeating action with: <green>"..action, "white") end medic.chaser.repete = action end
function medic.chaser.dorClear() medic.chaser.repete = false medic.note("No longer repeating") end
function medic.chaser.clear() medic.chaser.free = {} medic.chaser.queue = {} medic.chaser.repete = false medic.chaser.dochase = true medic.note("Clearing the queue") end

Script.name: show vitals changes
Script.script:
function medic.changes() if not last then last = gmcp.Char.Vitals end
if last.hp - vitals.hp > 0 then cecho(" <red>-"..(last.hp-vitals.hp).." <grey>health") elseif last.hp - vitals.hp < 0 then cecho(" <green>+"..(vitals.hp-last.hp).." <grey>health") end if last.mp - vitals.mp > 0 then cecho(" <red>-"..(last.mp-vitals.mp).." <grey>mana") elseif last.mp - vitals.mp < 0 then cecho(" <green>+"..(vitals.mp-last.mp).." <grey>mana") end
last = vitals end

Script.name: sipper_vitals
Script.script: function sipper_vitals() medic.sipper.health.cur = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) medic.sipper.health.max = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) medic.sipper.mana.cur = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp) medic.sipper.mana.max = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) curEnd = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ep) maxEnd = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxep) curWill = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.wp) maxWill = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxwp) exp = tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.nl) if gmcp.Char.Vitals.eq == '1' then if medic.equi == false then raiseEvent("svo got balance", "equilibrium") end medic.equi = true else medic.equi = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.bal == '1' then if medic.bal == false then raiseEvent("svo got balance", "balance") end medic.bal = true else medic.bal = false end vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals for _, item in ipairs(gmcp.Char.Vitals.charstats) do if string.match(item, '^Rage:') then vitals.rage = tonumber(string.split(item, ': ')[2]) elseif string.match(item, '^Shaping:') then vitals.shaping = tonumber(string.split(item, ': ')[2]) elseif string.match(item, '^Bleed:') then vitals.bleeding = tonumber(string.split(item, ': ')[2]) end end if medic.loki then if vitals.hp == vitals.maxhp and vitals.mp == vitals.maxmp then send("curing predict recklessness") end medic.loki = nil end end
